extendedIngredients.name: butter
extendedIngredients.original: Heat the butter in a large pot and when hot, add the shallot.
extendedIngredients.originalName: Heat the butter in a pot and when hot, add the shallot

extendedIngredients.name: celery
extendedIngredients.original: Chop the shallot and celery branches thinly.
extendedIngredients.originalName: Chop the shallot and celery branches thinly

extendedIngredients.name: goat cheese
extendedIngredients.original: Spread goat cheese on top and add slices of radish.
extendedIngredients.originalName: Spread goat cheese on top and add of radish

extendedIngredients.name: pb cups
extendedIngredients.original: Pour in individual cups, add celery salt and a dash of cream.
extendedIngredients.originalName: Pour in individual , add celery salt and a dash of cream

extendedIngredients.name: potato
extendedIngredients.original: Wash the arugula and peel the potato.
extendedIngredients.originalName: Wash the arugula and peel the potato

extendedIngredients.name: potato
extendedIngredients.original: Then add the potato cut in big pieces.
extendedIngredients.originalName: Then add the potato cut in big pieces

extendedIngredients.name: toast bread
extendedIngredients.original: Toast slices of brown bread (or baguette) and cut long rectangulars.
extendedIngredients.originalName: Toast of brown bread (or baguette) and cut long rectangulars

extendedIngredients.name: water
extendedIngredients.original: Add 500 ml water, salt and pepper.

title: Red Radish And Arugula Soup
summary: Red Radish And Arugula Soup might be just the main course you are searching for. This recipe makes 1 servings with 432 calories, 13g of protein, and 25g of fat each. For $2.4 per serving, this recipe covers 14% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. It will be a hit at your Autumn event. 3 people have tried and liked this recipe. If you have add water, spread goat cheese on top and add of radish, mix the vegetables, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. To use up the toast bread you could follow this main course with the French Toast Bread Pudding as a dessert. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 42%. This score is pretty good. Try Arugulan And Radish Salad, Chicken, Arugula, and Radish Pizza, and Radish and Arugula Crostini with Brie for similar recipes.
